creator: jergendutch@gmail.com
text:
The documentation for mod_setenvif could be clearer in three areas:

* With what can it be used? Does it work with every configuration directive?
(Even DocumentRoot?)
* How is an expression negated? Something like !^10\. ?
* How to use the values assigned to env vars? Something like env=LOCAL=0 ?

Sounds like you haven't found:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/env.html
or
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/glossary.html#regex
both of which are linked from the mod_setenvif docs.
creator: slive@apache.org
